column8: คุณสมบัติ : เปิดรับสิ่งใหม่ๆ และเปิดรับการทำงานในรูปแบบใหม่ๆ มี growth mindset รักที่จะเรียนรู้ และไม่ยึดติดกับกรอบเดิมๆ กระตือรือร้น update trend ใหม่ๆ ตลอด ใช้ AI ในการต่อยอดงานเป็น ชอบงาน communication design ทำงานได้หลากหลายแนว ตามแต่สไตล์ของสินค้านั้นๆ คุณสมบัติ ถนัด Design content / ads ได้หลาย Platform ใช้โปรแกรม Adobe เช่น Photoshop , Illustrator Premiere Pro/After Effect และ อีกมากมายได้ตามถนัด มีประสบการณ์ทำงาน Agency มาก่อน เข้าใจระบบและลักษณะงาน รับผิดชอบงานที่ได้รับมอบหมาย ทำงานร่วมกับคนอื่นได้ และสามารถทำงานภายใต้ความกดดันได้ดี โปรดแนบ portfolio มาด้วย

Jobtitle: Design Engineer (CATIA V5) 3 Position/วิศวกรออกแบบผลิตภัณฑ์
column8: Duties & Responsibilities: All design products must meet safety requirements, and correspond to Company’s Regulations and Standards Working as a team to Create and design 2D, 3D for Automotive Parts by using CATIA V.5 program based on Customer Drawing and RFQ for Automotive Parts. Evaluate of some products and adjustment with Japanese Engineers. Communicate with suppliers and customer for production in conditions designated by Company. Discuss and coordinate with Development Team Other works related to adjustment drafting process. Decide specification and define product shapes. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Engineer Working experience in Automotive Industry minimum 1-5 Years related to Car Interior, Exterior, Body Design Engineer etc. Experience working on CATIA V.5 Program (MUST) in 2D, and 3D Design. Good communication & writing skills in English. Can Speak Japanese for communication level would be advantage. Experience in Design Car Lamp for Automotive Industry would be advantage. Experience with Plastic Injection would be advantage. Able to use Microsoft office such as Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Outlook e-mail. Benefit Package: Annual Bonus Provident Fund Language Allowance Diligent Allowance Transportation Meal Allowance Over Time Payment Social Insurance Company Uniform Annual Leave Annual Health Check-up Group Insurance Education Grant Allowance Interested candidates are invited to apply by writing resume in *ENGLISH* stating present and expected salaries and enclosing a recent photograph. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified. How to apply Click APPLY NOW for submit your application. MURAKAMI CORPORATION (THAILAND) LTD. Address: No. 191/46 CTI Tower, 20th Floor, Ratchadapisek Road, Klongtoey Sub-District, Klongtoey District, Bangkok 10110 Website : http://www.murakami-kaimeido.co.jp

Scope of work: As a senior UI designer at Socket 9, you will lead the design of user interfaces for a variety of software products. This includes collaborating with cross-functional teams, mentoring junior designers, creating, and maintaining design systems, and communicating with stakeholders. You may also can conduct usability testing to gather feedback and insights from users. You will be responsible for managing your time and solving design challenges. In this role, you will have the opportunity to advance your career at your own pace while making a meaningful contribution to the success of our company's software products. Duties and Responsibilities: Lead the UI design process, collaborate with cross-functional teams including UX designers, developers, and product managers to ensure alignment with project needs and goals. Mentor junior designers, providing timely feedback and support. Work closely with developers to refine and implement UI designs, assisting in problem-solving and creativity to overcome design challenges. Establish and maintain design systems and style guides to guarantee consistent user interface across the software. Communicate effectively with both design and non-design teams, confidently presenting and justifying design decisions to stakeholders and clients. Other duties may be assigned by the supervisor. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer interface design or a related field. Minimum 4years’ experience in UI design, with a focus on senior-level roles. Experience supervising a team of designers. Expert proficiency in using Figma or Adobe XD. Strong understanding of UI industry standards and fundamentals. Excellent creative problem-solving skills and ability to think outside the box.

Job role overview: We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Jigs & Fixtures Design Specialist to join our dynamic team. As a specialist in jigs & fixtures design, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the seamless incorporation of new jigs & fixtures into our manufacturing process. Your expertise in jigs & fixtures implementation will contribute to the overall quality, performance, and functionality of our production lines. Duties and Responsibilities: Seeking a detail-oriented Assembly Jigs and Fixture Design Specialist. Design, develop, order and commission efficient assembly jigs and fixtures to enhance productivity and ensure product quality. Utilize CAD software, conduct testing, and collaborate with cross-functional teams. Participate in continuous improvement initiatives to optimise assembly fixture processes, reduce cycle time, and improve overall quality and reliability. Adhere to all safety protocols and guidelines while working and testing equipment, ensuring a safe and secure workplace for all team members. Undertake and assist with duties as required by your Manager. Key Deliverables: As a Jigs & Fixtures Design Specialist, your deliverables include: Complete fixture design based on component datum and GD&T, to enable assembly of part in a production environment. 3D model and 2D drawing of the highlighting critical dimensions and specifying appropriate materials. Implementation of the jigs and fixture into production environment. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering or related field required. Related education and work experience would also be considered. Proven experience in designing jigs & fixtures for a production environment. Fixture designs must fully accommodate datum systems and geometric tolerances of the components used. The ability to read and interpret component drawings drawn to BS8888. The ability to decipher datum equations from component level and utilise these in fixture design. Thorough working knowledge of AutoDesk Inventor software is essential. Strong knowledge of manufacturing processes, assembly techniques, and quality control standards Strong working knowledge in material selection, finishes, surface treatment, heat treatment processes. Ability to produce fully dimensioned 2D drawings to allow jig inspection upon receipt or by 3rd party. Experience in conducting feasibility studies and risk assessments for fixture design. Attention to detail and ability to work with precision. Strong problem-solving and communication skills needed. Proficient in English language Autonomous working style

สร้างกระดูกสำหรับมา Skin ให้ตัวละคร Paint Skin ให้ผิวขยับไปตามกระดูกชิ้นนั้นๆ สร้าง Controller เพื่อนำมาควบคุมกระดูกและนำไปให้ Animator ขยับ Rig ตัวละครทั้งตัว รวมถึงใบหน้าและสีหน้าของตัวละคร แก้ไขปัญหาเกี่ยวกับ Rig ได้ ใส่ลูกเล่นเทคนิคเข้าไปใน Rig เพื่อความสะดวกสบายของ Animator เขียน Script เช่น Mel, Python เพื่อสร้าง Tools ใช้ในการลดระยะเวลาในการทำงาน ฟังแผนงานในการ Rig ตัวละคร Qualification : วุฒิการศึกษาปริญญาตรีขึ้นไปสาขา 3D Animation มีประสบการณ์การทำงานอย่างน้อย 2 ปี มีความรู้ความเข้าใจในโปรแกรม Maya สามารถใส่กระดูกให้ตัวละครได้อย่างสมบูรณ์แบบ มีความรู้เรื่อง Model ทำเส้น Topology ให้สามารถนำมาทำ Blendshape ต่อได้ มีความรู้เรื่องการเขียน Script Mel, python

Job Description Understand user requirements, behavior and attitudes by analyzing and Interpreting Data from Data Analyst into insight Create new creative journey and/or optimize the journey with in-depth comprehension of the journey of the website/platforms Create storyboards, process flows, and sitemaps to illustrate a very complicate design concepts for very complicate website Create complicate prototype or wireframe to convey the message of the intended user experience Create a presentation that is easy to understand and have good storytelling, and present to both internal and external audiences Guide junior designers to help perfection the work Qualifications & Skills Portfolio with successfully launched projects such as UX research, UI Design (Website, Application etc.) 3+ years of Experiences Expertise in Figma is a must plus other standard UX and design software. Beginner Level skill on website analytic tool A solid grasp of user-centered design (UCD), planning and conducting usability testing, rapid prototyping, UX analysis, and accessibility implementation in design Ability to effectively communicate design processes, ideas, and solutions to project stakeholders Basic knowledge of content management systems (AEM, WordPress etc.),  HTML5, CSS3, skills are a plus Be highly creative and imaginative, with in target’s insight Moderate skill in English Team player with strong communication and presentation skills Office Location: T-One Tower (WeWork), 15-17th and 20th floor, Sukhumvit 40 Alley, Phra Khanong  Sub-District, Khlong Toei District, Bangkok Our working model: 5 working days (hybrid) - work from anywhere 2 days/ week 8 working hours (flexible) start from 7.00-10.00 a.m. Official hours: Mon - Fri, 9.00 a.m. - 6.00 p.m. Our Benefit: Transport allowance/ Living cost allowance Barista bar 9 a.m. - 3 p.m. Group Insurance Annual leave 8-20 days

Jobtitle: INTERIOR DESIGNER/อินทีเรียดีไซน์เนอร์
column8: ออกแบบ - เขียนแบบ ได้คล่องทั้ง งาน สถาปัตยกรรม แบบก่อสร้าง และงานระบบอาคาร และ ออกแบบ-เขียนแบบ งานตกแต่งภายใน และเฟอรินิเจอร์  สามารถ ไปวัดฟื้นที่หน้างาน เมื่อมาขึ้นแปลน ได้ สามรถช่วยดีไซน์เนอร์ เครียล์แบบ สเปค วัสดุ ต่างๆได้

What We want? Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other designers to create intuitive and visually appealing interfaces for web and mobile applications. Conduct user research to understand user needs, goals, and behaviors. Create wireframes, prototypes, and user flows to communicate design concepts and test usability. Design visual elements such as icons, typography, color schemes, and layouts. Work with developers to ensure the design is implemented correctly and to resolve any design-related issues. Continuously iterate and refine designs based on user feedback and testing results. Stay up-to-date with the latest design trends and best practices in UI/UX design. Contribute to the development of the design system and style guide to ensure consistency across products. Manage and prioritize multiple projects to meet deadlines and deliver high-quality designs. Who are looking for? Minimum of 3 years of experience in UI/UX design or a similar field. Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite and other design software. Strong understanding of typography, color theory, layout, and design principles. Experience with user research, wireframing, prototyping, and user testing. Excellent communication, problem-solving, and collaboration skills. Ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines.

Responsibilities Responsible for mobile design strategy and action plan in collaboration with software development team. Identify design problems and come up with sophisticated solutions. Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas. Deliver strategic design artifacts and customer/user experience decision related to core and new functions and features including (but not limited to) wireframes, user stories, user journeys/screen flows, and mockups optimized for wide range of mobile banking. Take a user-centered design approach and rapidly test and iterate own design and be responsible for end-to-end UI solution design. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in relevant fields with business and IT. Have experience in UI or interactive design of digital products. Familiar with Figma, wireframe or other visual design tools. Experience in designing iOS or Android apps. Be able to communicate design concepts through sketches and wireframes. Have great eye for balanced composition and layouts. Be-proactive, initiative and innovative. Nice to Have Knowledge in Human-Computer Interaction, Interaction Design, or related Work Location: Near Chong Nonsi BTS /  Saint Louis BTS (Hybrid Working)

Jobtitle: Product Designer/ออกแบบผลิตภัณฑ์
column8: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ ออกแบบผลิตภัณฑ์รุ่นใหม่ตามความต้องการของลูกค้า วิจัยและพัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์ใหม่ ที่ตอบสนองความต้องการของตลาด ปรับปรุงและพัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์เพื่อตอบสนองความต้องการของลูกค้า จัดทำเอกสารข้อมูลการออกแบบและข้อกำหนดต่างๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง ศึกษาและนำเสนอข้อมูลนวัตกรรมใหม่ๆ ในการส่งเสริมการพัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์ คุณสมบัติของผู้สมัคร ประสบการณ์ 0- 1 ปี รับพิจารณารับนักศึกษาจบใหม่ ระดับการศึกษา ปริญญาตรี สายศิลป์ สาขาเขียนแบบ หรือ ออกแบบผลิตภัณฑ์ ทักษะการใช้เครื่องในงานออกแบบ (Design Tool Skill) สามารถใช้เครื่องในการผลิตงานออกแบบ Drawing &3D Modeling ด้วย Software เช่น ACAD, 3DMAX, SketcUP Fusion360 Rhinoceros3D, Solidwork อย่างใดอย่างหนึ่งได้ Design Graphic ด้วย Software เช่น Adobe illustrator,Adobe Photoshop, Figma, Miro อย่างใดอย่างหนึ่งได้ มีพื้นฐานภาษาอังกฤษพอสมควร มีทักษะในการแก้ไขปัญหาเพื่อให้งานประสบผลสำเร็จ สวัสดิการ โบนัสตามผลประกอบการ กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ ที่พัก

Jobtitle: Project manager (Turnkey)/ผู้จัดการโครงการก่อสร้าง/ตกแต่งภายใน
column8: Job Highlights: Oversee the entire project lifecycle, including deal-making, design, budgeting, and construction. Responsibilities: Plan and manage resources, timelines, designs, and quality for each project, ensuring client expectations are met within budget constraints. Generate sales to achieve set goals. Oversee project timelines, budget control, concept and design, and coordination with subcontractors during the construction process. Supervise all aspects of the design process, including concept and design development, budgeting, and construction drawing, in collaboration with the Project Design Leader. Monitor on-site construction and ensure project progress aligns with business policies and schedule planning. Engage in discussions and negotiations with subcontractors and vendors. Inspect and assess the overall work progress of contractors. Manage changes to project scope, schedules, and costs using appropriate verification techniques. Provide regular project status reports and take corrective actions to ensure project progress stays on schedule. Handle budget management, quotations, and Bill of Quantities (BOQ). Qualifications: Bachelor's Degree or higher in Interior Architecture, Decoration, or related fields. Minimum 8 years of total working experience in the Interior Design field. Experience in Project Management within Consulting firms, Interior Design firms, or Construction firms specializing in interior design. Knowledge of Budget Control (BOQ). Ability to thrive under pressure and meet tight deadlines. Proactive thinking and strong analytical skills. Excellent interpersonal skills, including leadership, management, communication, problem-solving, and planning. Outstanding analytical and internal communication skills. Proficiency in English.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES (หน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบ): • ออกแบบผังภายในอาคาร ให้สอดคล้องกับการใช้งาน ภายใต้ระยะเวลาและงบประมาณที่กำหนด • ติดต่อประสานงานกับทุกฝ่ายที่มีส่วนเกี่ยวข้อง เพี่อประสานงานด้านการออกแบบ QUALIFICATION (คุณสมบัติ): Educations Background (การศึกษา) • ปริญญาตรี คณะสถาปัตยกรรม สาขาวิชาออกแบบภายใน Professional Experiences (ประสบการณ์การทำงาน) • มีประสบการณ์ด้านงานออกแบบสถาปัตยกรรมหรือตกแต่งภายใน Knowledge/Skills (ความรู้และทักษะ): • สามารถใช้โปรแกรม Auto Cad, 3D ,Photoshop, Powerpoint  ได้ดี

TrueMoney is a leading regional payment platform for digital consumers in Thailand and 6 other countries on Southeast Asia. We serve over 30 million people through our e-wallet app and network of 50,000 agents. We are part of the CP Group, Thailand’s largest private conglomerate. Our investors include Ant Financial (Alibaba Group), who also collaborates with us on technology. The UX Design team leads product design initiatives for TrueMoney Wallet and is responsible for all aspects of the user experience. We are seeking a Product Designer who is passionate about mobile user experience design to create new digital financial products and services. The ideal candidate is a passionate, yet pragmatic designer who can understand customer behaviors, problem-solve creatively, and create world-class experiences within a fast-paced and collaborative environment. You should be comfortable working with cross-functional stakeholders to create complex, customer-focused solutions. Responsibilities Partner with product and business teams to research, design, and prototype new user experiences. Create digital solutions that address customer needs and achieve business objectives. Perform user research to understand user needs and validate proposed solutions. Participate in internal projects to improve the effectiveness and efficiency of the UX design team. Qualifications 3+ years of product design experience, with an emphasis on mobile UX design Portfolio available demonstrating a history of delivering quality products, your roles and responsibilities, and the design processes used An understanding of user-centric principles, human-computer interaction, psychology,  and usability A talent for articulating ideas and presenting your work Fluency with industry-standard design tools (Sketch, Figma, InVision, Adobe CC) Experience mentoring and upskilling other designers Very comfortable with speaking up, asking questions, and receiving feedback Experience using Design Thinking (or similar design methodology) preferred Able to handle multiple projects and tasks simultaneously

Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Architecture or related fields Working experience up to 2-5 years in Architects High response for work. Good in Drawing. Creative thinking, great responsibility. Good in English will be an advantage. Computer skills: If can do in ArchiCAD will be an advantage. Good in Lumion Photoshop / Affinity Photo Illustrator / InDesign (optional) Basic Microsoft Office programs. Personal skills: A good team player. Good common sense Good sense of humor. Good Reliable & Responsible

Jobtitle: Signage Specialist (Wayfinding Production Draftman)/เจ้าหน้าที่เขียนแบบ Signage
column8: Job Description You will be part of the signage specialist team, working together closely with designers and project managers to bring the design for signage, sculpture and furniture to life. You will become a specialist in signage & wayfinding system design — crafting creative and efficient design details and material strategies for signage, sculpture and furniture projects. Responsibility Work with the design team to introduce materials and manufacturing techniques., Prepare production / construction drawings. especially signs and sculptures. Check the shop drawing and coordinate with the production team, quality of production at the factory and on-site installation, Coordination, production and installation of signs and sculptures. Qualification Bachelor of Architecture, Interior Design, Industrial Design or related field. High Responsible, careful and punctual with good human relations. Able to work together as a team, Communication and coordination skills with other people. Very wellKnowledge and understanding of production drawings and construction procedures Ability to read and interpret construction drawings, Architectural, structural and interior design as well. Can use llustrator, Photoshop and AutoCAD very well. If able to use English will be an advantage Benefits Performance bonus Annual Leave Extra long weekend Group insurance Work location : Near BTS Prompong

Scope of work : As the Head of Product Design, you will be responsible for leading the product design team and ensuring the creation of exceptional user experiences. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand user needs, define product design strategies, and oversee the entire product design process. Your goal will be to drive innovation, deliver high-quality designs, and enhance the overall user experience. Responsibilities : Lead and mentor the product design team. Define and implement product design strategies aligned with business objectives. Apply user-centered design principles to create intuitive and engaging product experiences. Establish and maintain design standards and guidelines for consistency. Collaborate with stakeholders to align design efforts and communicate effectively. Collaborating with HR on recruitment, onboarding, and performance evaluations. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree or higher in a related field such as Product Design, Interaction Design, or Visual Design. Or minimum 5 years of experience in product design, with at least 2 years in a leadership role. Strong portfolio demonstrating successful delivery of user-centered designs for digital products. Proficiency in design tools such as Sketch, Figma, or Adobe Creative Suite. Knowledge of design systems and design thinking methodologies.

This position is required previous experience of new product development, ideally in an automotive, manufacturing or engineering environment. Responsibilities Perform market researches to understand market requirements and initiate innovative product development. Develop and review design prototypes, perform test and finalize product design to facilitate mass production. Analyze new components, materials and technologies to evaluate functionality for all new product development. Lead/coordinate with multidisciplinary product launch teams to facilitate product launch plan. Design new concepts for development of new products and maintain technical compatibility to develop concepts into real products. Participate and promote continuous product improvement initiatives. Prepare comprehensive project plans with technical objectives and detailed cost estimates. Analyze product cost and prepare schedule plans for effective implementation of projects. Analyze and perform quantitative assessment of design prototypes in line with regulatory and industry norms to tackle all regulatory and marketing issues. Prepare and approve product design and test plans, review design and recommend adequate changes to the approved models before actual role out of new products. Approve prototypes of new designs, conduct performance analysis of prototypes and ensure assemblage of products follow company’s quality parameters. Design innovative production techniques and provide support to existing ones for new design roll out. Develop new technology and devices to test functionality of new products and manage same in target market. Administer progress of assigned projects to major stakeholders. Document records for all project proposal and associated activities. Qualification Bachelor’s degree in Engineering field. 3-5 years of related Plastic injection or design/development engineering experience. Ability to comply with design SW - Solid Work / Catia/ AutoCad. Verbal, written in English communication skills to support goabal team in APAC/UK/US region. Ability to train/manage/lead to a team. Solid organizational skills and ability to operate in a fast-paced environment with multiple priorities

Responsibilities: Following the development of our collections from Designer drawings through to final sample on graphic design Develop graphic standards and collaborate with Designer in the development of the collections. Develop creative design concepts that meet the business and brand. Support the Designers during the development of the collections to the required quality whilst hitting target cost prices. Bring new creative ideas to our products. Supporting the designers on creation of seasonal collections, components & materials sourcing, creating technical spec sheets etc. Contributing ideas and design artwork to the overall brief. Coordinate with Designer team to support all graphic design. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree or higher in Graphic Design, Fashion Design or related fields. Proficient computing skills is preferred in: illustrator, Photoshop, Drawing, Watercolor and Flat Drawing New graduate are welcome or minimum 1-2 years of graphic design experience. A good technical understanding of fashion industry is required. A good understanding of the constraints and requirements of working at designer level.

Design Engineer Responsibilities: Mainly responsibility is Design & Design support Skilled in Drawing (2D, 3D) Design product & drawing following specification of customer for production. Check production control plan & Ensure Technical spec availability Pre-define Process flow for production & ensure feasibility of product Define production technical file and raw materials needed for Production File document control for raw material & product. Make & Control Bill Of Material (BOM). Make & Follow sample product for customer approval. Make Document for Customer approval Record Requirement: Bachelor's Degree of Electrical Engineering /Electronic Engineering. 2-5 years up for experience in Engineering Design (Electronic / Mechanical Fields). Expert in AutoCAD (2D/3D) Skilled on Pack Office สวัสดิการ: โบนัส ประกันอุบัติเหตุกลุ่ม เงินช่วยเหลือต่างๆ(ฌาปนกิจ,งานแต่งงาน,ค่าศึกษาบุตร) ประกันสังคม สิทธิวันลาพักร้อนสูงสุด 20 วันต่อปี ฯลฯ ตรวจสุขภาพประจำปี สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน :  Bangkok Free Trade Zone (บางเสาธง  สมุทรปราการ) เวลาปฏิบัติงาน :  จ-ศ เวลา 07.30 -16.30 น. หรือ  08.30 – 17.30 น. Satys Electric (Thailand) Co., Ltd. No. 55/20,77 Moo15, Tambon Bangsaothong, Amphur Bangsaothong, Samutprakarn 10570 Tel : (66)2182 5198-9 ext.108 Fax : (66) 2182 5200 Website: www.satyselectric.com

Jobtitle: Interior Design (Product Development – High-Rise)/ออกแบบตกแต่งภายใน...
column8: Collaborate closely with outsourced design teams to develop and refine interior design plans for our condominium projects, both high-rise and low-rise. Provide feedback and guidance to the design teams, ensuring that their work aligns with project feasibility, practicality, and regulatory requirements. Offer insights and recommendations regarding materials, finishes, and furnishings that align with the desires of the target market and project objectives, while adhering to budget constraints. Oversee and manage the construction and installation of interior design elements, ensuring they meet the highest quality standards and are completed on time and within budget. Stay updated on industry trends and innovations, integrating them into design concepts as appropriate. Foster strong relationships with a network of vendors, suppliers, and contractors to ensure the timely delivery of materials and services, which are vital for maintaining project timelines. Present design concepts and progress reports to the company's management team, providing clarity and insights into the design process. Take ownership of project budgets and timelines, ensuring their successful execution within the allocated resources. Qualifications: Bachelor's or Master's degree in interior design or a related field, demonstrating your passion for design. A minimum of 5 years of experience in residential interior design projects, with a focus on condominium projects. Familiarity with managing outsourced design teams and coordinating their efforts to achieve project goals. A strong understanding of design principles, including color theory, space planning, and materials selection. Proficiency in design software such as AutoCAD 3D, Photoshop, and SketchUp, enabling effective communication and collaboration with design teams. Exceptional coordination skills with the ability to work effectively with multiple teams, resolving operational issues and minimizing delays. Outstanding multitasking abilities and meticulous attention to detail. Demonstrated leadership and management skills, essential for guiding and inspiring design teams. Willingness to conduct site visits in Bangkok and other locations if necessary to ensure the successful execution of design concepts. To apply for this unique opportunity, please send your updated resume and a portfolio showcasing your experience and design insights to Khun Chanchira at Chanchira.Su(@)sansiri.com or call 065-508-2100 .

We are looking to recruit MEP BIM Modeler for SITE Job Description Use Autodesk Revit to Deliver 2D&3D for Electrical & Mechanical Drawing to meet the schedule Create LOD 200 350 BIM Model for 2D Drawing, 3D Visualization, 4D Simulation and 5D Quantity Take-off Create & Manage data in the BIM Model to meet the client, BEP Requirement and use the data for tags and make a schedule in 2D drawing. Check and correct design conflicts or report to relevant personnel to find a solution. Help improve and develop the Revit Family & Template for work that also meet the TTI Standard. Requirement Graduate bachelor’s degree in electrical Engineer, Mechanical Engineer or Other Related Understanding of LOD Definition and can apply LOD concept to daily task. Understanding of BIM data such as project parameter, shared parameter, type& instance parameter, Loadable & system family Have a BIM Experience or Using Autodesk Revit for making 2D Drawing at least 1 year Can use Naviswork Manage for Clash Detection and 4D Simulation (Plus) Have Revit MEP Professional License (Plus) Can create and develop Revit Family (Plus) Can use Dynamo for increasing productivity of work (Plus) What you will get from Thai Takaneka: Health Insurance Life Insurance Dental fee Provident fund Please apply with detailed resume (English only) and photo to: Thai Takenaka International Ltd. Human Resource Department 191 Silom Complex, 26th Fl., Silom Rd., Bangkok 10500 Tel: 02-266-2800 Fax: 02-266-2808-9 Website: https://www.takenaka.asia/thailand

About the job As a part of the Store Interior Design team, you use your deep knowledge of people’s life at home and your high level of home furnishing competence to show many functional, beautiful sustainable and affordable solutions that are relevant to your local market. You also challenge and encourage the many people to see their homes in new ways. Your assignment • Contributing to positioning the IKEA store as the first choice for home furnishing in your local market. • Applying your home furnishing knowledge to ensure up-to-date room settings and other store media that exceed our visitors’ expectations. • Stimulating and increasing the interest for home furnishing through constantly showing new and inspiring solutions that motivate people to visit the IKEA store frequently. • Using the richness of the IKEA product range to show distinct and different styles that appeal to many individual tastes and needs. • Reflecting the IKEA Brand identity by creating visual impact in all commercial, sales support and co-worker areas. Your profile • An education in interior design or architecture. • A deep passion, curiosity and understanding of home furnishing and people’s everyday life at home. • Creative thinking supported by commercial visual competence and a keen eye for aesthetics. • Actively seeking improved methods of working in a simple, lean and cost-efficient way. • Understand interior design and trends that influence GROWING TOGETHER: IKEA offers an exciting and empowering work environment in a global marketplace. As the world’s leader at life at home, you have exceptional opportunities to grow and develop together with us. Offering Benefits: Salary, Incentive, Company Uniform, IKEA Products' Staff Discount, Gift Voucher for special occasions, Medical benefit (including children), Dental allowance, Insurance (Health/ Life/ Accident), Provident Fund, Annual Leave, etc

สามารถบรีฟงาน วางแผน และสร้างสรรค์ Content ต่างๆ ด้านการตลาด ทั้งออนไลน์ และ ออฟไลน์ อย่างสร้างสรรค์ และโดดเด่น คิด Concept และออกแบบ Artwork วาง Layout สำหรับสื่อ ออนไลน์ และ ออฟไลน์ ความเชี่ยวชาญในการออกแบบ CI Branding, Online media และ Promotion บนสื่อ Social Media เชี่ยวชาญการใช้โปรแกรม Photoshop และ Illustrator และอื่นๆ เช่น Adobe premiere pro สามารถทำ Infographic ได้ มีความเข้าใจเทรนด์การตลาดออนไลน์ ชื่นชอบสื่อ Social Media (Facebook, Instagram,  Tiktok) สามารถนำความชอบมาประยุกต์ใช้กับงานได้ตลอดเวลา สามารถถ่ายภาพและ ตัดต่อวิดีโอได้ จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สามารถทำงานวันหยุดในบางครั้งได้ ระดับปริญญาตรี ไม่จำกัดสาขา หากมีประสบการณ์จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ

Jobtitle: Assistant Project Landscape Manager/ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการฝ่ายโครงการภูมิสถาปัตย์
column8: Assistant Project Landscape Manager :  ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการฝ่ายโครงการภูมิสถาปัตย์ รายละเอียดงาน 1. รับผิดชอบเรื่องการตรวจสอบ จัดเตรียมแบบสำหรับก่อสร้างงานวางผังโครงการ และงานภูมิสถาปัตย์ 2. จัดทำ ข้อมูลเกี่ยวกับวัสดุต่างๆ ที่ใช้ในงานภูมิสถาปัตย์ 3. ประสานงานกับฝ่ายต่างๆ ( บริษัทผู้ออกแบบ, Suppliers, ฝ่ายคุมงานก่อสร้าง และผู้รับเหมาก่อสร้าง) เพื่อให้ผลงานออกมาได้ตามแนวทางออกแบบที่เกิดขึ้นให้สมบูรณ์ที่สุดในการก่อสร้างได้ 4. ให้คำแนะนำ รับคำสั่งเพื่อเขียนแบบอื่นๆได้ รวมถึงสนับสนุนข้อมูลให้กับฝ่ายต่างๆ 5. งานอื่นๆที่ได้รับมอบหมายร่วมกับฝ่ายต่างๆ คุณสมบัติของผู้สมัคร 1. จบปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป สาขา Landscape / Architecture หรือสาขาต่างๆที่เกี่ยวข้อง 2. มีประสบการณ์ด้านการตรวจงานภูมิสถาปัตย์ เทียบกับ งานโครงสร้าง และงานระบบที่เกี่ยวข้องได้ 3. สามารถแก้ปัญหางานออกแบบภูมิสถาปัตย์และการวางผังโครงการ รวมถึงติดตามงานก่อสร้างเทียบกับแบบได้ 4. สามารถเรียนรู้การเขียนแบบร่วมกับทีม และรับคำสั่งเพื่อดำเนินงานเขียนแบบ ออกแบบ 5. สามารถเดินทางไปตามโครงการต่างๆ (ศรีนครินทร์-กรุงเทพกรีฑา / สวนหลวง / บางนา / ประชาชื่น / รัชดา) ได้ 6. มีประสบการณ์ทั้ง แนวราบและแนวสูง จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ Please send full details of your qualifications, portfolio, current and expected salary to:- HR. Dept. Contract : Chayanit (Ploy) Tel. 02-2610265 Ext.604 PM Group Company Limited 23rd Fl.CTI Tower,Ratchadapisek Rd., Klongtoey, Bangkok 10110.

The Architect/ Interior Design based in Spring Tower-Ratchathewi, Bangkok. Providing support technical, detail drawing, sketch up and presentation to enhance E&A Design Consultants (Included Specification team) effectiveness output for increasing satisfy E&A and Owner Buildings. The role requires comprehensive design plans as part of project proposals, following the clients' specifications and business requirements. To provide technical support and design for the Architect’s opinion to enhance E&A Design Consultants Prepare 3D Sketchup and Detail drawing related with business requirements. Prepare budgetary proposal and presentation tools. Support to achieve the overall E&A Design Consultants (or specification team targets) and budgeted sales volume, margin, and revenue. Provide technical expertise and support to channel partners in all aspects of architect design-related issues. To ensure technical capabilities and design code stay abreast with local, AS & Euro standard or approval code. Eager to search for and learn innovation related jobs. Capable of working under minimum supervision either independently or in a team (including cross function). Carry out duties as and when directed by the management. Qualification and/or experience required: Bachelor’s degree in fields of Architect / Interior design or related. Minimum 5 years to work in the construction industry. Able to use AutoCad, Sketchup, Photoshop, or Graphic design software for presentation and animation. Strong project management skills with ability to prioritize and multitask. Excellent communication, interpersonal and presentation skills Able to work independently and as part of a team. At NS BlueScope our success comes from our people. We choose to treat each other with trust and respect. We understand that the range of perspectives that result from having a diverse and inclusive workplace will strengthen NS BlueScope’s capability for continued and sustained business success. How to apply: Interested applicants, please send your resume to Apply Now. NS BlueScope (Thailand) Limited Bangkok Office : A 188 Spring Tower, 14th Floor, Unit No.1-5, Phayathai Road, Tung Phayathai, Ratchathewi, Bangkok, 10400 NS BlueScope (Thailand) Limited, No. 2 | Soi G 9 | Pakornsongkrohrad Rd | T.Maptaphut | A.Muang | Rayong 21150 | THAILAND T +66 (0) 3891 8300 F +66 (0) 3891 8301 Visit our website: https://www.nsbluescope.com [link removed] Notes: Only shortlisted candidates would be contacted.

Your challenge: The Product Design Lead sets the benchmark for creating rigorous research backed, end-to-end product experiences for customers that are easy to use, employ best-in-class design practices, and are based firmly in customer needs and business goals. They are chief collaborators with the business, technical, and product leaders to understand the vision, objectives, and transformation plans to help identify opportunities for competitive advantage. The Product Design Lead is hands-on, planning and executing core activities such as research, synthesis and design execution, leading a team of product designers to to achieve exceptional customer-centered outcomes Work with the product, business and technology teams to define, scope and manage the end-to-end product experience Manage the design team activities from research and ideation through to execution and ensure consistent high-quality outcomes Guide UX designers on design strategy related to research and insights generation and then execute high quality UX artefacts Guide UI designers on executing best in class visual design work that is consistent, on brand and user backed Work with the front end developers to ensure the successful implementation of the visual design and product interaction Mentor and coach the design teams, specifically with new ways of working and mapping strategy to execution Identify and remove team impediments Work with CPO and POs to align the roadmap to vision and continuous insights to ensure voice of the customer is heard Constantly look for better ways of solving technical problems and designing the solution, not afraid to challenge the status quo Attend events and sessions, promoting customer focus, and being visible at town hall events. Synchronizing customer research and map customer journeys for the constituent across teams Synthesize customer insights across research by each team at the journey level Help define and shape the experience strategy, facilitating work sessions with stakeholders and users to define key design goals and requirements. Requirements: Ability to plan, direct and deliver clear research process and artefacts (e.g., qualitative, quantitative, usability testing, task flows, wireframes, mockups, prototypes and design systems to guide consistency across teams Can make design decisions at a team and product level Experience working on projects that span multiple organizations and business units Significant experience driving design outcomes in an Agile infrastructure, environments, and deployment strategies Seasoned design expertise with deep insight into newest methods, trends, and design operations Experience in Agile Development as a product designer, including tools such as Jira and Confluence Experience managing design priorities within the backlog Understands relationship between Product Owner, Scrum Master, and rest of the team, with a strong sense of design thinking Strong communication skills with ability to align the organization on complex product decisions while advocating the voice of the customer Active coach and mentor whose goals are to grow and maximize the team’s potential

ROLE DESCRIPTION FURNITURE & LIGHTING DESIGNER 3D MODERLER Company Overview: AvroKO has established a new paradigm in the hospitality industry, encompassing a multitude of disciplines while creating thoughtful and engaging architecture, brands, products, and environments. Since its launch in 2001, AvroKO has earned a reputation as one of the most innovative design firms in the field, due in large part to the group’s integrated design process and focus on creating emotionally connected experiences. In the past decade, the firm has grown to five offices (New York City, Bangkok, San Francisco, London and Miami) working on projects across 22 countries in 32 cities, launched over a dozen company owned-and-operated restaurants, created a furniture and lighting company (Goodshop), and developed a separate branding and strategy division dedicated to projects of scale (Brand Bureau). We are seeking a skilled and creative 3D Modeler to join our growing design team and contribute to the development of cutting-edge furniture and lighting products. Position Overview: As a Furniture and Lighting Design 3D Modeler, you will play a crucial role in translating design concepts into detailed and visually stunning 3D models. Working closely with our furniture and lighting teams, you will be responsible for creating accurate and visually appealing models that align with our design vision and meet industry standards. Responsibilities: 3D Modeling: - Create detailed 3D models of furniture and lighting designs using industry-standard software(E.g., Rhinoceros, Sketchup, Solidworks). - Ensure accuracy in dimensions, proportions, and materials. Collaboration: - Collaborate with designers to understand design concepts and project requirements. - Participate in design reviews and provide input on feasibility and manufacturability. Innovation: - Contribute to the innovation of new design concepts through 3D modeling techniques. - Stay updated on industry trends and incorporate innovative ideas into designs. Problem Solving: - Address design challenges and propose solutions to enhance functionality and aesthetics. - Work closely with the design team to refine and improve designs based on feedback. Efficiency and Time Management: - Manage workload efficiently to meet project deadlines. - Prioritize tasks and communicate effectively with team members to ensure smooth project flow. Qualifications: - Proven experience as a 3D Modeler, preferably in the furniture and lighting design industry. - Proficiency in 3D modeling software (E.g., Rhinoceros, Sketchup, Solidworks). - Strong understanding of design principles and attention to detail. - Excellent communication and collaboration skills. - Ability to adapt to evolving design concepts and project requirements. Education: - Bachelor's degree in Industrial Design, Product Design, or a related field. Additional Skills (Preferred): - Experience with rendering software (e.g., V-Ray). - Knowledge of materials and manufacturing processes in furniture and lighting design. - Familiarity with industry trends and emerging technologies. If this sounds like you and the opportunity of working with a fast-moving, dynamic company excites you, then please send us your recent photo, CV and your portfolio (Resume in English only). AVROKO CO., LTD 177/1 BUI Building, 17th floor, Surawongse Road, Siriyawongse, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500 (BTS Chong Nonsi and BTS Saladaeng) Tel: 02-108-1777-82

Summary The Specialist, IT Solutions will engage with site business functions to identify and advocate business process improvement opportunities through the use of IT solutions. Collect, analyze, develop, document and communicate business requirements, and work with various IT teams to develop and deliver solutions. Provide support and user training on selected systems (for example SFC, ERP and local applications). Participate in IT projects in various capacities, including project coordination and management. Detailed Description Performs tasks such as, but not limited to, the following: Engage with community to explore opportunities for the use of IT solutions Gather and document business requirements Work with various IT teams to develop and deliver IT solutions Respond to system problems by analyzing the issue and determining the next course of action Provide system training to end users Participate in and lead various IT projects as required Knowledge/Skills/Competencies Strong customer service orientation Leadership and teamwork skills. Good ability to plan projects and tasks. Project management skills. Good analytical, technical, troubleshooting and problem-solving skills. Good communication, documentation (including flow charting) and presentation skills. Understanding of an electronic manufacturing environment, materials and processes. Understanding of SCM, shop floor control and ERP applications. Solid knowledge of the business area to be supported and a solid understanding of its associated business processes. Strong understanding of software development life cycle concepts and practices. Knowledge/experience with application-to-application and business-to-business integration. Basic to good coding skills in specified programming languages. Understanding of interrelations between IT components (software, OS, databases, network, servers, etc.) Physical Demands Duties of this position are performed in a normal office environment. Duties may require extended periods of sitting and sustained visual concentration on a computer monitor or on numbers and other detailed data. Repetitive manual movements (e.g., data entry, using a computer mouse, using a calculator, etc.) are frequently required. Typical Experience 4 to 6 years; Experience in SAP or ERP system Typical Education Bachelor's Degree

column8: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ ออกแบบงานตกแต่งภายใน จัดทำเพรทนำเสนอผลงาน เลือกวัสดุให้เหมาะสมตามแบบ ออกแบบด้วยโปรแกรม Sketch up หรืออื่นๆได้ จัดทำแบบก่อสร้างด้วยโปรแกรม AUTO CAD จัดทำเอกสาร PR (ใบสั่งซื้อวัสดุ) ตามแบบแต่ละโครงการ ประสานงานโครงการ ตรวจสอบคุณภาพงาน ความถูกต้อง เคลียหน้างาน ทำ shop drawing เคลียแบบให้ทีมผลิต และคอยตรวจสอบให้การดำเนินงานเป็นไปตามแผนงานและตามกำหนดการ จัดทำรายงานความคืบหน้าประจำสัปดาห์แต่ละโครงการ หากมีประสบการณ์ การควบคุมหน้างาน หรือสามารถเมเนจเมนท์งานผลิตได้ จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ หากขับรถเป็นและมีรถยนต์ส่วนตัวจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ คุณสมบัติ มีความรับผิดชอบ มีไหวพริบ สามารถแก้ไขปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้ดี มีความรอบคอบ มีสติ วางตัวดีมีความเป็นผู้นำ พูดจาสุภาพ บุคคลิกดี มั่นใจ สามารถทำงานได้ขอบเขตหลากหลาย รักการเรียนรู้ ริเริ่มสร้างสรรค์ มีความขยัน อดทน รับแรงกดดันได้ดี ประสานงานคล่องตัว ตรงต่อเวลา บริหารจัดการเวลาได้ดี จบการศึกษาปริญญาตรีสาขาออกแบบตกแต่งภายใน มีประสบการณ์ด้านการตกแต่งภายในอย่างน้อย 2 ปี จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สวัสดิการ เงินเดือน เบี้ยขยัน โบนัสประจำปี ประกันสังคม โทร. 093-323-4882, 086 -342-4395, 02-108-2098 ตำแหน่ง โลเคชั่น ( ชั้น 1 เป็นร้านกาแฟ ) KK Cafe' by KK Design Studio แขวงดอกไม้ เขตประเวศ กรุงเทพมหานคร 10250 https://www.google.com/maps/place/KK+Designstudio+Architect+Construction+Co.,Ltd./data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x311d5fd983cc0f0b:0x538ad5d9d07feddb!8m2!3d13.6632347!4d100.6949934?authuser=0&hl=en&rclk=1

Job Purpose Senior User Experience Researcher is responsible for leading a UX team in studying and understanding user behaviors, needs, and preferences in order to create intuitive and engaging digital experiences. They combine research, analysis, and design principles to optimize the usability and user satisfaction of a product or service. Responsibilities 1) User Research: Conduct user research activities such as interviews, surveys, and usability testing together insights into user needs, goals, and behaviors. 2) Data Analysis: Analyze and interpret qualitative and quantitative data collected during user research to identify patterns, trends, and user pain points. 3) User Personas: Develop user personas that represent the target audience, incorporating demographic ,behavioral, and attitudinal characteristics. 4) Information Architecture: Create and refine the information architecture of digital products or services ,ensuring logical and intuitive navigation and organization. 5) Wireframing and Prototyping: Design wireframes, interactive prototypes, and mockups to communicate design concepts and validate user flows and interactions. 6) Usability Testing: Plan and conduct usability testing sessions to evaluate the effectiveness and efficiency of product designs, identifying areas for improvement. 7) Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams including designers, developers, product managers, and stakeholders to ensure user-centered design approaches and align on project goals. 8) Iterative Design: Iterate on designs based on user feedback and testing results, continuously improving the user experience throughout the development lifecycle. 9) Accessibility: Advocate for and integrate accessibility considerations into the design process, ensuring products are usable by individuals with disabilities. 10) Industry Research: Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends, UX methodologies, and emerging technologies to inform design decisions and enhance user experiences. Qualification - Strong knowledge of UX research methods, including user interviews, usability testing, and surveys. - Proficiency in design tools such as Sketch, Adobe XD, or Figma for wireframing and prototyping. Analytical mindset with the ability to derive meaningful insights from user data.      - Excellent communication skills to effectively collaborate and present findings to diverse stakeholders. Familiarity with front-end development principles and constraints is beneficial. - Understanding of accessibility guidelines and best practices. - Attention to detail and a passion for creating exceptional user experiences. - Prior experience in financial industry or with financial products will be given special consideration. ******************************************************** All applications will be treated in strict confidence. All material submitted in connection with your application will become part of our confidential recruitment files. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. By submitting your curriculum vitae or personal data to us in connection with your job application, you are deemed to have read and agreed to the terms of our Privacy Policy, and consented to the collection, use and disclosure of your personal data by us and our affiliates, in accordance with our Privacy Policy. Please visit www.360qm.co.th for a copy of our Privacy Policy. If you wish to withdraw your consent, please drop us an email to let us know. ******************************************************** Interested candidates please send CV to sarawan.w @ 360qm.co.th  for more information please call/line 065-232-4155
